happy.name: Pasta Primavera
happy.steps: Cook pasta. Sauté vegetables. Mix together with parmesan.

happy.name: Fruit Salad
happy.steps: Chop fruits. Mix with honey and yogurt.

happy.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
happy.steps: Grill chicken. Assemble sandwich with lettuce and tomato.

happy.name: Mango Smoothie
happy.steps: Blend mango, yogurt, and milk until smooth.

happy.name: Veggie Stir Fry
happy.steps: Stir fry vegetables. Add soy sauce.

sad.name: Mac and Cheese
sad.steps: Boil macaroni. Mix with cheese and milk.

sad.name: Chocolate Cake
sad.steps: Mix ingredients. Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.

sad.name: Cheesy Garlic Bread
sad.steps: Spread garlic butter on bread. Top with cheese and bake.

sad.name: Mashed Potatoes
sad.steps: Boil potatoes. Mash with butter and milk.

sad.name: Brownie Sundae
sad.steps: Warm brownie. Top with ice cream and chocolate syrup.

stressed.name: Grilled Cheese
stressed.steps: Butter bread. Add cheese. Grill until golden brown.

stressed.name: Avocado Toast
stressed.steps: Mash avocado. Spread on toast. Add lemon juice and salt.

stressed.name: Tomato Soup
stressed.steps: Simmer tomatoes, onion, and garlic. Blend and add cream.

stressed.name: Energy Bars
stressed.steps: Mix ingredients. Press into a pan and refrigerate.

excited.name: Tacos
excited.steps: Cook meat. Fill tortillas with meat, cheese, and lettuce.

excited.name: Pizza
excited.steps: Spread sauce on dough. Add cheese and toppings. Bake at 400°F for 15 minutes.

excited.name: Buffalo Wings
excited.steps: Bake wings. Toss in hot sauce and butter.

excited.name: Nachos
excited.steps: Layer chips with cheese and jalapeños. Bake and serve with salsa.

excited.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
excited.steps: Mix ingredients. Bake at 350°F for 12 minutes.
